sorcer.service

Interface Revaluation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Context<T>, InclusiveContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayContext, ControlContext, IfExertion, Job, ListContext, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, PositionalContext, ServiceContext, ServiceExertion, SharedAssociativeContext, SharedIndexedContext, SignedServiceTask, Task, WhileExertion

    public interface Revaluation
    If an Evaluation that is Revaluation isRevaluable then it returns the revaluated value, otherwise returns the evaluated value (
